title: PBE/NA normal client not handshaking
body:
I was able to log onto the forums but I'm not able to log on my PBE or normal (NA) account. Says I have an incorrect password but I'm 100% positive it's correct because i just logged in the forums. I noticed the password reset page is down too. (probably to high traffic.)

Anyone else seeing this?

replies.body: Should be good to go! We had some login issues earlier today but those should all be fixed at this point. Let me know if you still can't get logged in though!
Yep Yep Yep, same thing here....
